      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_78637</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Centre of mass</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mitte der Masse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Centre de la masse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Centro da massa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Centro di massa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κέντρο της μάζας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Centro de la masa</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the location of the centre of mass of the child with respect to the pivot point. While all the parts of the child's body has weight, it is more convenient to consider the total weight as a single force acting on the centre of mass.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">centre of mass</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Forces</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Mass</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">pivot point</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">suspension point</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">swing</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">turning effect</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">weight</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt den Standort der Mitte der 
Masse des Kindes in Bezug auf den Gelenkpunkt. Während alle 
Teile des Körpers des Kindes Gewicht hat, ist es bequemer, das 
Gesamtgewicht für eine einzelne Kraft zu halten, die auf der Mitte 
der Masse fungiert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre l'emplacement du centre 
de la masse de l'enfant en ce qui concerne le point de pivot. 
Tandis que toutes les parties du corps de l'enfant a le poids, 
il est plus commode de considérer tout le poids comme force simple 
agissant au centre de la masse.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a posição do centro da
massa da criança com respeito ao ponto do pivô. Quando todas 
as partes do corpo da criança tiverem o peso, é mais conveniente 
considerar o peso total como uma única força que age no centro da 
massa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la posizione del 
centro di massa del bambino riguardo al punto del perno. Mentre 
tutte le parti del corpo del bambino ha peso, è più conveniente 
considerare il peso totale come singola forza che si comporta sul 
centro di massa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τη θέση του κέντρου της 
μάζας του παιδιού όσον αφορά το σημείο άξονα. Ενώ όλα τα
μέρη του σώματος του παιδιού έχουν το βάρος, είναι 
καταλληλότερο να θεωρηθεί το συνολικό βάρος ως ενιαία δύναμη 
ενεργώντας στο κέντρο της μάζας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la localización del 
centro de la masa del niño con respecto a la punta del pivote. 
Mientras que todas las partes del cuerpo del niño tienen peso, 
es más conveniente considerar el peso total como sola fuerza que 
actúa en el centro de la masa.</string>
          </description>
